version_description:
- Fixed an issue that sometimes crashed when browsing pictures;
- Some other details adjustments;

If you love Yealico, please rate it and recommend it to more friends.

If you find more problems during use, please send us your feedback via the official website or email. It is best to provide the site rules in question and describe the process in which the problem occurred.

Thank you!

Website: yealico.wordpress.com
Email: yealico.app@gmail.com

谢谢！
